item.description:
Weekly meeting with meditation, discussion about techniques & mindfulness practice, and joining in spiritual community. Please bring any meditation accessories (cushion, bench, shawl, etc.), plenty of chairs available. Some classes may include guided meditation, special guest speakers, or readings. We'll try to let people know in advance.

All levels are welcome with some instruction available for beginners. A small donation is requested to cover expenses. Open to the public, bring friends if you want.

Contact Tom for more information by clicking on "email me" link.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be greeting people as they arrive.
item.name: Weekly Mindfulness Meetup
